columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores whether retroadjudication was accepted or rejected for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Accepted


Rejected


Automatically Accepted


Automatically Rejected


Instant Retro

columns.name: ACTION_DATE
columns.description: Date the charge was accepted or rejected for retroadjudication

columns.name: REJECT_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason retroadjudication was rejected for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not a Charge Transaction


Voided Transaction


Out Of Max Days Range


Already Retroadjudicated


Retroadjudication Not Needed


No Open System Batch


In Accepted Queue


In Rejected Queue


Orig Cvg Eff On Svc Dt


Same Cvg, Same Pln/Pln Grp


Same Payor


Supplemental Charge


CRNA Charge


Attached Insurance Payment/Adjustment


Patient Due and Paid Off


Same Payor, Same Plan


Retro Extension Error


Charge Bundled


Small Balance Due


Service Date Too Old


Small Insurance Due


Insufficient Security for Retro


Zero Dollar Charge


Matched Credit > $0


Invalid Acct Type


Reject All Chg Extension


Claim Submitted For Orig Payor


Do Not Bill Insurance Charge


Same Payor, Subscriber ID


Invalid Account Status


Dental Payment Plan Charge


Ambulatory Pharmacy Charge


Dental Predetermination Charge


No Effective Date


Bad Debt Transaction


Already Self-Pay


Charge Paid Off


Auto Profile Reject


Tax Charge


Auto Reject due to VFO Conversion


Home Infusion Adjudicated Charge

columns.name: ACCEPT_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason retroadjudication was automatically accepted for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Charges Not Triggered


Primary Coverage Unchanged


Self-Pay to Coverage


No Claims Sent to Original Payor

columns.name: RETRO_COMMENT
columns.description: Free text comment to further describe the retroadjudication event.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: User responsible for accepting or rejecting retroadjudication

columns.name: TRIGGER_DATE
columns.description: The date when the charge was identified as candidate for retroadjudication.

columns.name: TRIGGER_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores a reference to the last user to make changes that caused the charge to be a candidate for retroadjudication.

columns.name: ACTION_TIME
columns.description: Time the charge was accepted or rejected for retroadjudication.

columns.name: MANUAL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The retroadjudication reason category IDï¿½selected in account maintenance for the transactions.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Addition/Deletion/Change in Patients


Change Patient Covered Flag


Change Patient Effective Date


Change Coverage Effective Date


New Coverages


Add Member


Change Member Effective Date


Remove Member


Add Account


Change Benefit Plan on Employer Group


Change Coverage Term Date


Change Member Term Date


Change Covered Status


Change Riders on Employer Group


Remove Benefit Plan from Employer Group

Change Termination Date on Employer Group


Change Effective Date due to Group Term Date


Change Term Date due to Group Effective Date


Change Coverages
